title: 1997 Trailer Haul Cement Mixing Dump Trailer
item_description:
Trailer Haul Cement Mixing Dump Trailer

Trailer Details

  • Year: 1997
  • Make: Trailer Haul
  • VIN: 1T9MS1221VS362084
  • License # per DMV (not included): 4CD4659
    • Expiration Date: 9/30/2027
  • Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR): 5,999 Lbs
  • Trailer Type: Dump

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 186”
  • Overall Width: 66”
  • Overall Height: 84”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Hydraulic
  • Number of Wheels: 4
  • Tire Size: ST225/75R15
  • Electric Plug Type: 4-Way Flat
  • Hitch: 2" Ball

Note: Application for Replacement Title, and Transfer Form will be mailed 2-3 weeks following the last day of removal on the 28th. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, registration, replacement plates, taxes, and fees due to DMV.
